Name: DefaultLocomotion
Author: Janis Sprenger
LongDescription: A fallback MMU allowing arbritrary global repositioning in space without animations.

Parameters.Name: TargetID
Parameters.Description: The ID of the target object (target location).

Parameters.Name: linearVelocity
Parameters.Description: Linear velocity for character transport. If not provided, instant teleportation is utilized. In any other case, linear interpolation with the given velocity is used
